-----Original Message-----
From: webmaster@nnrealm.com [mailto:webmaster@nnrealm.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2007 4:54 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: Re: [ThePlanet-C2602049P] Abuse : legal action will be taken in
24h

He shutted down my content. The sponsor he was promoting closed his
account for various reasons and this one I ve complained to you is the
first one . 
That guy steal others content without autorization, he shows photos that
he is not autorized to expose. Coz I m the only one that have
autorizations by the girls and 2257 autorization. this is a serious
issue. If I see my RSS feeds and / or my content there again I will sue
him , pass him the news.

P.S:

Im just one of the 27 other webmasters that want him nailed . If he dont
show my content anymore I consider this accident closed.

Thx for your attention.
----- Original Message -----
From: "DMCA" <dmca@theplanet.com>
To: <webmaster@nnrealm.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2007 11:45 PM
Subject: FW: [ThePlanet-C2602049P] Abuse : legal action will be taken in
24h

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir

one of your customer is literally stealing my RSS feedc content and
changing the PSID affiliate . He copy my content and use it for make
money himself. Thats an abuse , I never authorized him . I will
immediately take legal action against him for sure and you if you dont
shut him down immediately due for the fact he violate the

USC Titile 17 violation

The site I m talking about is :
http://live-webcam-girls.live-sex-blog.com/

he take feeds from a lot of my blogs .

You have 24h , I want him shutted down and never go up again with my
content .

Im sure you understand , best regards.
